meanings.definition: The act of moving through the air using wings.
meanings.sent1: The bird's graceful flyings amazed the children at the park.
meanings.sent2: I watched the flyings of the butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The flyings of the paper airplane were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight with the flyings of a magical bird.
meanings.sent5: The flyings of the kite against the blue sky were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Pieces of material that are scattered or blown by the wind.
meanings.sent1: The flyings of leaves in the autumn breeze created a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent2: I saw the flyings of dust particles in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The flyings of confetti at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The flyings of snowflakes in the storm looked like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The flyings of petals from the flower made a beautiful trail in the wind.

meanings.definition: The action of traveling in an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: My first experience with flyings was on a family trip to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The flyings over the mountains provided a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: The flyings on the airplane felt like a magical adventure.
meanings.sent4: His job required frequent flyings to different countries.
meanings.sent5: The flyings during the storm were a bit bumpy but exciting.
